KEY FEATURES
================================================================================

NATIVE INSTALLATION (NO DOCKER)
- Direct installation on WSL/Linux/macOS
- Systemd service integration
- No container overhead

MULTI-RUNNER SUPPORT
- 3-5 runners per host recommended
- Isolated work directories: ~/actions-runner-N/_work
- Unique service names per runner

CROSS-PLATFORM COMPATIBILITY
- Windows + WSL 2.0 (primary target)
- Ubuntu 20.04+ / Debian
- RHEL/CentOS/Fedora
- macOS 12+

LABELS (DEFAULT)
- self-hosted
- linux
- x64
- ai-agent
- wsl-ubuntu-22.04

AUTOMATION FEATURES
- Automatic runner version detection
- Download latest GitHub runner binaries
- Systemd service creation and start
- Health validation with auto-fix
- Label presets for quick configuration

ERROR HANDLING
- Comprehensive validation at every step
- Rollback capabilities
- Detailed error messages
- Remediation suggestions

SECURITY
- Never run as root
- Secure credential storage (600 permissions)
- Token expiry handling
- Audit logging

================================================================================
INSTALLATION EXAMPLES
================================================================================

SINGLE RUNNER:
    ./scripts/setup-runner.sh --org myorg --token ghp_xxxxx

MULTI-RUNNER (3):
    for i in {1..3}; do
      ./scripts/setup-runner.sh --org myorg --token ghp_xxxxx --runner-id $i
    done

VALIDATION:
    ./scripts/validate-setup.sh --runner-id 1

LABEL MANAGEMENT:
    ./scripts/configure-labels.sh --runner-id 1 --action list
